price: How many generations have We destroyed before them, and they cried out when it was too late for deliverance.
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
